channel.title: How To Jar and Sign A Server!
channel.description:
Lil_Smok3r Here With another TuT! Today im going to show you guys "How to jar and sign" a server.. So Lets Begin! Note: I havent really tried hard on this Tut, The More The Views, The better i remake :D [font=arial black][size=36pt]Btw Rep++ would be appreciated[/size][/font] :L Difficulty: 5/10 First Download Jar Maker From Here: http://uppit.com/7hnzo2t5336f/JAR_Maker.rar Or http://uppit.com/7hnzo2t5336f/JAR_Maker.rar
[font=arial black][size=24pt]Now Make A File In Your Desktop called "Webclient" or your server name "Smok3scape" Then open your jar maker and make sure the output directory is at webclient like this:[/size][/font]
The Output Jar File should look like this: Smok3.jar [IMG]http://i1249.photobucket.com/albums/hh520/PsycoNoob/OutputDirectory.jpg[/img] [font=arial black][size=24pt]The Input Directory should be bin (from your servers client)[/size][/font] [IMG]http://i1249.photobucket.com/albums/hh520/PsycoNoob/Input.jpg[/img] [font=arial black][size=24pt]Now Click On Manifest Template and type in loader and click set manifest and click Create Jar.[/size][/font] [IMG]http://i1249.photobucket.com/albums/hh520/PsycoNoob/Manifest.jpg[/img] [font=arial black][size=24pt]Now go over to jar signer and the input jar file should be NAMEHERE.jar!The JarSigner location should be the route to your java jarsigner like this:[/size][/font]
[IMG]http://i1249.photobucket.com/albums/hh520/PsycoNoob/Jarsigner.jpg[/img] Now click on the ... for keystore file and go to your folder you made called webclient or watever you named it and click open > OK > Generate Keystore
[font=arial black][size=24pt]Now type in your games name for the keystore Alias Then type your public key (a password) and your private key (also a password) It should all look like this:[/size][/font]
[font=arial black][size=24pt]Now click Sign Jar![/size][/font] [IMG]http://i1249.photobucket.com/albums/hh520/PsycoNoob/Signjar.jpg[/img]
GRATZ! you have Jarred and Signed! :D

item.title: How To Jar and Sign A Server!
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Lil_Smok3r Here With another TuT! Today im going to show you guys “How to jar and sign” a server… So Lets Begin!
Note: I havent really tried hard on this Tut, The More The Views, The better i remake [font=arial black][size=36pt]Btw Rep++ would be appreciated[/size][/font] :L
Difficulty: 5/10
First Download Jar Maker From Here: http://uppit.com/7hnzo2t5336f/JAR_Maker.rar
Or
http://uppit.com/7hnzo2t5336f/JAR_Maker.rar

[font=arial black][size=24pt]Now Make A File In Your Desktop called “Webclient” or your server name “Smok3scape”
Then open your jar maker and make sure the output directory is at webclient like this:[/size][/font]

The Output Jar File should look like this: Smok3.jar

[font=arial black][size=24pt]The Input Directory should be bin (from your servers client)[/size][/font]

[font=arial black][size=24pt]Now Click On Manifest Template and type in loader and click set manifest and click Create Jar.[/size][/font]

[font=arial black][size=24pt]Now go over to jar signer and the input jar file should be NAMEHERE.jar!The JarSigner location should be the route to your java jarsigner like this:[/size][/font]


Now click on the … for keystore file and go to your folder you made called webclient or watever you named it and click open > OK > Generate Keystore

[font=arial black][size=24pt]Now type in your games name for the keystore Alias
Then type your public key (a password)
and your private key (also a password)
It should all look like this:[/size][/font]

[font=arial black][size=24pt]Now click Sign Jar![/size][/font]

GRATZ! you have Jarred and Signed!

Read full topic
item.source: How To Jar and Sign A Server!
